GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.16.5
GSD.description:
usb: gadget: f_sourcesink: Fix isoc transfer for USB_SPEED_SUPER_PLUS

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.5 by commit 103938dd5798e150689362290274b87af54e3a52, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 90c4d05780d47e14a50e11a7f17373104cd47d25. For more details please see the references link.
